page.title: 18SW BASINGSTOKE: SHOPPING
page.content: There are two shopping centres at { {Brighton Hill}and{Kempshott,}serving large housing estates. The village of{ {Cliddesden}has a combined Post Office/shop, but at {Farleigh}is just a small General Store. People use these shops only for convenience as their prices are higher, so they tend to go to Brighton Hill or Basingstoke for their main weekly shopping. At Brighton Hill there are free car parks near a large Sainsbury's supermarket. There is a ten pence deposit to use a trolley to wheel the shopping to your car. Altogether there are thirteen shops at the centre including a chip shop, bank, chemist, hair-dresser and newsagent/post office. The shops are open six days a week.
